Dear players,

I wanted to know how to fight a nasty bug, which makes a rover being like "flying" despite being on the ground?

Some surfaces seems to provoke problems of grip for the rovers. It behaves like if the surface was covered of ice. As consequence, the rovers have difficulties to climb, and even more difficulties to control their speed by going down, which generally conduct to crashes.

 

On this screenshot, if you look the information of VOID, the rover is indicated as "Flying" rather than "Surface". As consequence, the autopilot does not manage to control the speed (set to 8 m/s):

Spoiler

Thanks for your help
